explains: n. 执照，许可证；特许（同 licence）
vt. 许可；特许；发许可证给
wordGroup: business license 营业执照；运业执照
license number 牌照号码；登记号码
license system 许可制度；签证制
license key 许可密钥；许可证号
license contract 许可证合同；特许合同
license fee 许可证费用，执照费

sentences.en: She was released after posting $100 cash bond and her driver's license.
sentences.cn: 交了100元现款保释金及驾驶执照以后，她获得保释了。

sentences.en: May I see your license, please?
sentences.cn: 我可以看一下你的驾驶执照吗？

sentences.en: Your license is no longer valid.
